named-query.name: Restaurant.findByNameAndKitchenIdXML
named-query.query: from Restaurant where name like concat('%', :name, '%') and kitchen.id = :id

named-query.name: Restaurant.existsUserManager
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Restaurant rest join rest.users managers where rest.id = :restaurantId and managers.id = :userId

named-query.name: Order.isOrderManagedByr
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Order order join order.restaurant res join res.users managers where order.code = :code and managers.id = :userId
